name: Stinky Troll Muncher
description:
You hear someone yell stupid burger. You turn around to find a stinky troll in arms reach. It reaches out for you. Petrified you run in the opposite direction. Those cube looking things weren't there before, were they? It picks you up. It takes a munch out of you as your eyes slowly close as you make peace with the fact that you are being eaten by a troll.

Entry for the VR Jam 2021
